name: Bijoux Eyeshadow Palette
slogan: NARS’ largest eyeshadow palette ever.
usage: Apply shadow directly on top of primer to create full intensity that lasts all day. The versatile formula can be used as an eyeshadow or liner, applied wet or dry.
details:
The MECCA view:
Strike it rich with a palette of sixteen limited-edition intensely pigmented eyeshadows in decadent jewel tones and velvety neutrals in matte, satin, and shimmer finishes, plus glitter toppers. Swipe and shade your way to style.
 
Palette shades:
Under your skin (shimmering beige silver)
Devotion (sparkling antique gold)
Copycat (shimmering rose)
Fuel the fire (sparkling amber)
Do it again (light pink satin)
Limelight (sparkling pink/gold)
Pandemonium (shimmering amethyst
Thrill seeker (light forest green matte)
Dirty deeds (mauve matte)
On fire (shimmering burnt orange)
Get hot (ruby satin)
Midnight rider (shimmering emerald)
Idolized (shimmering cocoa)
Go deep (burnt sienna matte)
Girl gang (cocoa matte)
Powerhouse (deep brown satin)

Pair it with:
NARS Smudge Proof Eyeshadow Base
NARS #20 All Over Eyeshadow Brush
Nars Summer Solstice Cheek Duo

name: High Profile Cheek Palette
slogan: A holiday-themed limited-edition cheek palette.
usage:
Use #16 Blush Brush to apply your selected shade of Blush to the apples of the cheek.
Sweep any excess across the hairline, bridge of the nose and chin.
To enhance your glow, swirl #14 Bronzer Brush or Yachiyo Kabuki Brush over two or more shades in the palette and buff on cheeks.

name: Afterglow Lip Shine Set
slogan: A trio of NARS Afterglow Lip Shine favourites.
usage:
Apply Afterglow Lip Shine to bare lips for a sheer wash of color.
Start in the center of your upper lip and apply color from the center to the outer edges, following the contours of your mouth. Repeat on lower lip.
To add shine and subtle illuminating effects, apply as a topcoat over other lip colors.

name: Soft Matte Complete Foundation
slogan: 16-hour wear matte foundation.
usage: Dispense a small amount on to the back of your hand. One drop delivers full coverage with fingertip application. PAT product with fingertips. Start at the center of the face and gently PRESS the foundation on skin. Use a stippling motion to BLEND outward. Work in small sections, focusing on one area at a time. After each use, wipe off excess product from nozzle and close cap tightly.
details:
The MECCA view:
NARS debuts a breakthrough oil-free matte foundation with this high-performing, full-coverage formula. Crafted to leave you with a skin-like finish that not only mimics a healthy-looking complexion but delivers it too thanks to NARS’ Anti-Oxidation Complex and the Hydramatte Balancing Complex. The Anti-Oxidation Complex helps prevent colour shifting while protecting skin from pollution and blue-light damage while the Hydramatte Balancing Complex balances excess sebum and keeps skin hydrated with a combination of micro-algae and bio hyaluronic acid. Coupled with superior oil absorbing powders the formula serves up 16-hour wear that creates a smooth, mattified, second-skin look that’s transfer- and shine-proof.

Key ingredients:
Superior oil absorbing powders: help absorb the appearance of excess sebum for a lasting mattifying effect so complexion stays fresh.
Optimal diffusing powder: maximizes light diffusion with spherical surface powders designed to absorb and refract light for an instant blurring effect that creates a smooth, second-skin appearance.
Micro-algae extract: helps balance the appearance of excess sebum so skin looks renewed and perfected.
Bio hyaluronic acid: helps hydrate skin and maintain its moisture balance, so complexion looks bright and smooth.

Pair it with:
NARS Radiance Primer
NARS Light Reflecting Pressed Setting Powder
NARS Soft Matte Complete Concealer

name: Soft Matte Tinted Lip Balm
slogan: A soft matte lip balm available in nude shades.
usage:
Apply directly onto lips for the perfect amount of diffused matte lip color in just one swipe.
Apply any shade of Soft Matte Tinted Lip Balm to bare lips for a sheer tint of color or as a base under any lip shade.
Tap Soft Matte Tinted Lip Balm onto cheeks with fingertips for a natural-looking flush of color.
details:
The MECCA view:
Swipe on this sheer matte lip balm that delivers a wash of nude lip colour with a diffused and blurred finish. Available in a spectrum of shades that are suitable for all skin tones. 
Key ingredients:Amino acid powder: amplifies formula’s silky texture for optimal spreadability.
Olive oil wax: boosts creaminess without feeling greasy or sticky.
Bamboo fibers: impart a diffused, soft-focus effect due to their ability to absorb moisture.
Pair it with:
NARS Blush
NARS Sheer Glow Foundation
NARS Climax Mascara

name: Climax Liquid Eyeliner
slogan: A matte black liquid eyeliner.
usage: Use the tip of the brush to create thin lines and precise details. Gently push the tip in between lashes to add natural definition to the lashline. For optimal application, store liner lying horizontally when not in use.

name: 9X L'il Extra Artistry Palette
slogan: A party-ready palette of irresistible hues.
usage: Pick up your favourite brush and start experimenting with these purple hues. For a more vibrant and intense eye look, wet a synthetic brush to pick up colour.
details:
The MECCA view:
Pop the sparkling with this party-ready palette of irresistible hues. Your looks will glow a l'il extra this season thanks to rich mattes, vibrant berries, and all that glistening goodness.

Made without:
Parabens and sulphates.

Pair it with:
Morphe Continuous Setting Mist
Morphe Eye Obsessed 12-Piece Eye Brush Collection + Bag

name: 35x Big Primpin' Artistry Palette
slogan: 35 glam shades to rock this season.
usage: Pick up your favourite brush and start from there! For the increased colour intensity, wet a synthetic brush to pick up colour.
details:
The MECCA view:
Take that glam all the way with this stunning lineup of shades that are equal parts naughty and nice. A 35 pan eyeshadow palette featuring flirty shimmering nudes and perfect mattes. There's something for everyone in this palette.

Made without:
Parabens and sulphates.
Pair it with:
Morphe Continuous Setting Mist
Morphe X Ariel Signature Look 12-Piece Face & Eye Brush Set
Morphe 9E Pretty in Peach Artistry Palette

name: Jaclyn Hill 12pan Eyeshadow Palette
slogan: Meet 12 covetable neutrals for endless looks.
usage:
Just Barely and Good Vibes are your new transition besties. With a fluffy crease blending brush, pull these colors slightly past where your brow ends to create the illusion of a bigger eye. 
Apply Awe Luxe to center of your lid to enhance space.
Use Chic Happens to highlight brow bone and the inner corner of eye.
Using an angled eye brush, smudge Boo Bear on your lash line to thicken the appearance of your lashes.
details:
The MECCA view:
A revealing palette of covetable neutrals in 6 velvety matte and 6 gilded shimmer finishes for endless looks. From wearable to wow-able, Jaclyn Hill created the ultimate nude eyeshadow palette with these super-versatile shades that'll leave you looking good awe naturel.

Made without:
Parabens and sulphates.
Pair it with:
Morphe Eye Obsessed 12-Piece Eye Brush Collection + Bag
Morphe Continuous Setting Mist

name: Make It Big Brush-Tip Liquid Liner
slogan: An ultra precise liquid eyeliner.
usage: For mega-rich color, always shake before use. Store liner upside down so the brush stays saturated.
details:
The MECCA view:
Make an impact with this long wearing liquid liner that delivers up to 18 hours of smudge and water resistant wear. It glides on with ease and features an ultra precise brush tip to define eyes, perfect for creating bold wings and subtle flicks. 

Made without:
Animal products, parabens and sulphates. 
Pair it with:
Morphe Make It Big Lip Plumper
Morphe Make It Big Volumizing Mascara
Morphe The Big Prime Lash Primer

productVersion.name: Make It Big Brush-Tip Liquid Liner

name: Coca-Cola x Morphe Cherry Coke Artistry Palette
slogan: A Coca-Cola Cherry inspired 18-pan eye palette.
usage: For precise application and seamless blending, apply using brushes. For a more pigmented, intense application, pat colour directly onto the eyelid using your finger.

productVersion.name: Coca-Cola x Morphe Cherry Coke Artistry Palette

name: Cheek You Out Cream Blush
slogan: Lightweight, buildable cream for cheeks.
usage: With a clean finger or a brush, apply the product to the cheeks, starting in the area you want the most concentrated colour and blending outwards gently.

name: Blush Infusion
slogan: A naturally sheer flush of colour to the cheek.
usage: Apply to the apple of the cheeks in soft, sweeping circular motions and blend for an even, natural-looking flush.
details:
The MECCA view: 
Longwearing yet weightless, this sheer powder blush offers fresh buildable colour to impart a healthy-looking flush. This hero is infused with micro-fine powders, ensuring a silky-smooth texture that blends seamlessly into the skin.

Blush Infusion is available in a range of shades from soft neutrals to vivid pops of colour in matte or sheen finishes.

Pair it with: 
Mecca Cosmetica Blush Brush
Laura Mercier Matte Radiance Baked Powder
Laura Mercier Pure Canvas Primer - Hydrating

name: RoseGlow Caviar Stick Eye Shadow
slogan: Rosy neutral eyeshadow sticks.
usage: Apply eyeshadow directly to the lash line or all over the eyelid for higher impact.
details:
The MECCA view:
These versatile and easy to use shadow sticks can be layered under or over eye shadows and used all over the lid or around the lash line. The smooth and creamy texture glides comfortably and easily on the eyelid with maximum blendability for an endless array of looks. Water and crease-resistant, these rosy neutrals last all day long with a 12-hour wear formula. 
Made without:
Parabens, sulfates and phthalates. 
Pair it with:
Laura Mercier Eye Brow Pencil
Laura Mercier Caviar Volume Mascara

name: Translucent Loose Setting Powder
slogan: Best-selling setting powder with no flashback.
usage:
Press an application puff into the powder, working the product into the puff by tapping on the back of the hand, then gently press into the skin. 
Pairs perfectly with the Velour Puff.
details:
The MECCA view:
An ultra-lightweight, finely-milled powder adds a hint of sheer, matte coverage and sets makeup without settling in fine lines or looking cakey. Ideal for photos with it's no-flashback formula and soft-focus technology which blurs the appearance of fine lines and imperfections for up to 23 hours. Available in two shades to perfectly set any skin tone: Translucent for fair to medium and tan skin tones, and Translucent Medium Deep for medium to deep skin tones. Dermatologist tested.
Want to know more? Chat to our in-store team for personalised application advice now.
Made without: 
Oils.
Pair it with:
Charlotte Tilbury The Air-Brush
Laura Mercier Velour Puff
Charlotte Tilbury Lip Cheat
Direct from the brand:
Be sure to check if you’ve applied enough by touching the cheek — the area should feel smooth. If the area feels tacky to the touch, then you need more powder. 
- Laura Mercier, Founder
Awards:
Voted “Best Makeup Extender” by you in the MECCA Beauty Election 2020.

name: Face Illuminator
slogan: A multi-dimensional, customisable highlighter.
usage: Using a brush, lightly sweep over the areas of the face where the light naturally hits: your cheekbones, cupids bow, brow bone, and the bridge of your nose. To give eyes extra sparkle, add a touch to your inner corners.

name: Secret Concealer
slogan: A hydrating, longwearing under eye concealer.
usage: Apply under the eyes and on the outer corners using a brush or the ring or pinky finger. Set with powder.
details:
The MECCA view: 
This longwearing under eye hero masks dark circles and discolouration with lightweight medium coverage and a natural finish. Formulated to sit comfortably on the delicate eye area without drying the skin, this concealer is both dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested ensuring total peace of mind.
Pair it with: 
Hourglass Concealer Brush
Laura Mercier Secret Brightening Powder for Under Eyes
Mecca Cosmetica Hydrating Eye Cream

name: Lip Glacé
slogan: A nourishing, new-generation coloured gloss.
usage: Dot onto the centre of the lip using the applicator and tap with your finger, blending to create a natural tint. For a classic glossy effect, apply straight to the lip. Layer over a lipstick of choice for maximum intensity.
details:
The MECCA view:
Far from the clingy, drying glosses of the past, this nourishing glacé coats lips in rich, buildable colour while ensuring they are kept hydrated, protected and never sticky. This product can be dotted onto the lips and blotted with your finger for a sheer wash of colour or layered for high shine intensity.

Pair it with:
Too Faced Lip Injection Extreme
Laura Mercier Velour Extreme Matte Lipstick
Mecca Cosmetica Nourishing Cleansing Oil

name: Pure Radiant Tinted Moisturiser
slogan: An award-winning, hydrating tinted moisturiser.
usage: Apply to clean skin, blending with your fingertips.
details:
The MECCA view:
Ask any MECCA beauty junkie to name their most coveted complexion products and chances are NARS will be high up on the list, especially when it comes this stand-out tinted moisturiser. The advanced, oil-free formula provides a translucent veil of colour and gives a radiant, luminous finish. Infused with natural botanicals and hydrating extracts, it grants a bright, natural-looking glow. Think: your skin almost bare, but better.
Expert tip:
Add an alluring glow and extend the wear of your makeup for up to 16 hours by mixing one pump of NARS Tinted Glow Booster into your tinted moisturiser. 
Key ingredients:
Light-diffusing pigments: blur and soften the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and pores. 
Mineral rich sea water: revives the complexion leaving it softer, smoother and brighter.
Kopara from French Polynesia: hydrates skin and encourages natural cell renewal for a healthier looking complexion.

Made without:
Oil, parabens and synthetic fragrance. 

Pair it with:
NARS Radiant Creamy Concealer
NARS Radiance Primer
Hourglass Ambient Lighting Powder

From the shop floor:
“For added glow, mix in a small amount of NARS Illuminator before application.” – Tybion, Colour Specialist at MECCA Booragoon.

name: Optimal Brightening Concentrate
slogan: Instantly brighten your complexion.
usage: Apply 2-3 drops over face and neck every morning and evening. Massage and press the serum into the skin. Follow with your moisturiser.
details:
The MECCA view:
Infused with NARS Light Reflecting Complex™, this radiance-boosting serum instantly brightens skin and revitalises the complexion. Potent multi-action vitamin C clarifies and evens skin tone whilst working to prevent and repair visible signs of ageing. Dark spots begin to fade from view and skin appears youthful and luminous.

Key ingredients:
NARS exclusive Light Reflecting Complex™: restores youthful radiance so skin looks revived and luminous. 
Vitamin C: brightens as it helps fade the appearance of dark spots and discolourations, and helps prevent new spots from forming.
Noni fruit extract and plankton extract: revitalise and boost cellular energy, helping cells perform at their optimal level. 

Made without:
Oils, parabens and synthetic fragrance.

Pair it with:
NARS Purifying Foam Cleanser
NARS Aqua Gel Luminous Oil-Free Moisturiser
NARS Total Replenishing Eye Cream

name: Total Replenishing Eye Cream
slogan: For bright, de-puffed eyes.
usage: Pat cream around the eye area gently using your ring finger.
details:
The MECCA view:
Deeply hydrating yet quick to absorb, this eye cream is clinically proven to minimise the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and puffiness, whilst working to boost the skin’s natural collagen production. With a plethora of naturally derived active ingredients ready to work their magic, skin appears brighter and more luminous. 

Key ingredients:
Bio-hyaluronic acid: attracts and retains water in the skin creating a more supple appearance.
Active peptide complex: diminishes the appearance of under eye circles and reduces puffiness.
Beech bud extract: boosts collagen production.

Made without:
Oil, alcohol, synthetic fragrance, sulphates and parabens.

Pair it with:
NARS Aqua Gel Luminous Mask
NARS Purifying Foam Cleanser

name: Moisture Surge™ 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator
slogan: A deeply hydrating and nourishing gel-cream.
usage: Use morning and night on clean skin. Can be used under or over makeup and also as a 5-minute mask.
details:
The MECCA view:
An oil-free, gel-cream that serves up 100 hours of hydration whilst penetrating deep within the skin's surface layers (up to 10 layers deep). It's lightweight and formulated with a blend of aloe ferment and hyaluronic acid to plump and hydrate. The best part? skin is still left hydrated even after washing your face. 

Key ingredients:
Aloe bio-ferment: helps infuse skin with moisture. 
Hyaluronic acid: has the unique ability to hold 1,000 times its weight in water, helping to create a “moisture reservoir” for ideal hydration.
Activated aloe water: holds both positive and negative ionic charges which helps skin absorb moisture more easily.
Auto-replenishing technology: using activated aloe water and caffeine, it helps trigger skin’s own rehydration system.
Made without:
Parabens, phthalates and fragrance.
Consumer testing results:
High-Performance Results
After one use
Boosts moisture by +174%.**
Provides 100 hours of hydration.
Provides a smooth canvas for makeup application.
Same lightweight, addictive, oil-free gel-cream texture.

After one week
99% of women said skin felt deeply hydrated.***
95% of women said skin looked plump.***
91% of women said skin looked glowing.***
98% of women said skin felt more resilient.***
95% of women said skin felt healthier.***

*Into skin’s surface; in vitro testing after 30 minutes.
**Clinical testing on 19 women.***Consumer testing on 110 women.

Pair it with:
Clinique Moisture Surge Overnight Mask
Clinique Even Better Clinical™ Serum Foundation SPF 20
MECCA MAX SPOT DOTS Blemish Busting Patches

name: Moisture Surge Sheer Tint SPF25
slogan: A sheer, perfecting tint with SPF protection.
usage: Apply in the morning, directly to clean skin or over moisturiser and serum.
details:
The MECCA view:
The ultimate undetectable skin enhancer plus skin-loving SPF—what more could you want? This sheer tinted moisturiser provides up to 12 hours of hydration, whilst blurring imperfections and offering SPF 25 protection. A blend of hydrating ingredients, including hyaluronic acid and activated aloe water, ensure skin is kept moisturised and nourished for up to 12 hours. The sheer tint, suited to most skin tones, subtly blurs imperfections and is sweat resistant. SPF 25 ensures the skin is protected against damaging UV rays.
Key ingredients:
Mimetic-Shade™ Technology: designed to ensure each sheer, perfecting shade blends flawlessly with a range of skin tones.
Hyaluronic acid: to moisturise, reduce inflammation, prevent water loss and boost skin’s elasticity and plumpness.
Aloe: known for its healing properties, is widely used to reduce inflammation, soothe and hydrate skin.
Made without: 
Parabens, phthalates, oil and fragrance.
Pair it with:
Clinique Chubby Stick Sculpting Contour
Clinique Moisture Surge 72-Hour Auto-Replenishing Hydrator
Clinique Chubby Stick Sculpting Highlight

name: Moisture Surge Overnight Mask
slogan: Get a soft and dewy glow by morning.
usage:
Gently dispense a 20-cent-piece-sized amount of product and smooth over cleansed, exfoliated skin in a thin layer, avoiding the eye area. If using on neck and decolletage, use another 20-cent-piece-sized amount.

Leave for 30 minutes or overnight. Remove with a cloth and warm water, following with serum and moisturiser.
details:
The MECCA view:
Go to sleep wrapped in this ultra-hydrating mask and wake up radiant and refreshed. Formulated with a buttery-rich yet oil-free texture, this overnight mask penetrates the skin deeply to replenish lost moisture and soothe irritation. Infused with anti-oxidants and sodium hyaluronate, your skin will build its own natural moisture barrier and resist harmful irritants. Perfect for long haul flights or pre-wedding nights!

Key ingredients: 
Sodium hyaluronate: a hyaluronic acid derivative that works like a sponge, absorbing hydration and slowly drip-feeding it to the deeper layers of the skin. 
Vitamin E: chief skin soother and hydrator, this key ingredient smooths the skin, breaks down redness and helps soften scars.
Glycerin: a skin-identical hydrator that works hard to lock in moisture within the deep layers of the skin, for a radiant complexion that lasts. 

Made without:
Parabens, phthalates and fragrance.

Pair it with:
Korres Greek Yoghurt Foaming Cream Cleanser
Tatcha Violet C Brightening Serum
Kiehl's Calendula Water Cream

name: Pep-Start Eye Cream
slogan: Revive tired eyes with a burst of caffeine.
usage:
USAGE:
Scoop a pea-size amount onto ring finger, gently massage under the eye, in tapping motions. Can be used on the eyelid. Use on clean dry skin, follow with the rest of your routine. Use day and night.
details:
The MECCA view: 
Instantly rejuvenate and perk up eyes with this antioxidant-rich brightening eye cream. Formulated to banish fine lines and puffiness, this formula keeps the eye area is left looking fresh, smooth and youthful. Ophthalmologist tested.

Key ingredients:
Hexapeptide-8: designed to strengthen the cells, like a little gym for the fine muscles under the eye to smooth and lift.
Sodium hyaluronate: a derivative of hyaluronic acid, which works like a sponge to absorb hydration and slowly drip-feed it into the deep layers of the skin.
Caffeine: promotes circulation to tighten the skin and shift darkness under the eye.

Made without: 
Parabens, phthalates, fragrance and essential oils.

Pair it with:
JOSIE MARAN COSMETICS Argan Bright Skin Vitamin C Serum
GLOW RECIPE Watermelon Glow Pink Juice Moisturizer
APOT.CARE Optilash Lash Enhancing Serum

name: Clinique For Men Face Wash
slogan: Fuss-free daily cleansing, guaranteed.
usage:
USAGE:
Apply on dry or wet skin post or pre-shave. Apply a 10 cent piece size of cleanser into palms of hands, gently massage in circular motions into the skin and avoiding eye area. Use as the first step of your skincare routine, using before toner, serum and moisturiser. Use day and night.

name: Clarifying Lotion 3
slogan: Sweep away impurities and detox pores easily.
usage:
USAGE:
Use on cleansed, dry skin. Dispense a 20 cent piece size of lotion onto a cotton round, gently massage in circular motions into the skin and avoiding eye area. If using on the neck and decolletage use a further 20 cent piece amount of product. Use as the second step of your skincare, following with serum and moisturiser. Use day and night.
details:
The MECCA view: 
Clear away pollution and eliminate dulling flakes for smooth, glowing skin every day. As the second step in Clinique's 3-step care system, this toner tightens problematic pores in the blink of an eye. Prep and primes skin to better absorb moisture and build resilience to impurities. Dermatologist-reformulated to be comfortable, non-drying for happy, harmonious skin daily. Perfect for oily, acne-prone skin types.

 Key ingredients: 
Sodium hyaluronate: a derivative of hyaluronic acid, which works like a sponge to absorb hydration and slowly drip-feed it into the deep layers of the skin.
Witch hazel: a natural astringent, perfect for clearing acne and strengthing the skin barrier.
Salicylic acid: this clarifying beta-hydroxy-acid (BHA) gently exfoliates the pores for a deeper cleanse. 

Made without: 
Fragrance and essential oils.

Pair it with:
Clinique Clinique iD™: Concentrate For Irritation
GOLD FADEN MDBright Eyes
Juice Beauty Prebiotix™ Hydrating Gel Moisturiser

name: Ultra Facial Cream
slogan: A lightweight moisturiser for 24-hour hydration.
usage: Apply on clean facial skin to combat moisture depletion. Can be used day and night as the ultimate complement to your skincare routine.
details:
The MECCA view:
The #1 product by Kiehl's, this ultra-hydrator has a unique lightweight texture and offers 24-hour hydration. With each application - day or night - the skin is left 2.3x more hydrated, even in the driest areas. Non-greasy and extremely easy to wear, this iconic moisturiser is uniquely formulated for all skin types - even sensitive skin.
Did you know a jar of this moisturiser sells every 6 seconds? Find out more here.
Want to know more? Chat to our in-store team for personalised application advice now.

Key ingredients:
Glacial glycoprotein: protects skin from changing temperatures, facilitating water retention of the skin.
Avocado oil: to provide intensive moisture to the skin.
Squalane: to help replenish skin’s barrier, keeping it soft, supple and moisturised.

Made without:
Parabens, sulphates and fragrance.

Pair it with:
Kiehl's Ultra Facial Cleanser
Kiehl's Ultra Facial Oil-Free Toner
Kiehl's Daily Hydrating Duo
Learn more about:
Squalane
Squalane

name: Ferulic Brew Rejuvenating Facial Essence
slogan: A ferulic acid infused facial essence.

name: Daily Hydrating Duo
slogan: A super hydrating face & eye treatment.
usage: After cleansing and toning, apply a dime-sized amount of Ultra Facial Cream to your fingertips. Massage onto face in a circular motion. Can be used day and night as the ultimate complement to your skincare routine. Apply Creamy Eye Treatment with Avocado along the orbital bone with your fingertip. Gently tap around the delicate eye area until fully absorbed. Avoid pulling the skin. Can be applied day or night.
details:
The MECCA view:
Treat your skin to 24 hour hydration with this duo featuring the #1 product by Kiehl's; Ultra Facial Cream 50ml and cult favourite Creamy Eye Treatment 14g. Your overall complexion will be left feeling super hydrated whilst your delicate under eye area will be nourished, de-puffed and the appearance of fine lines will be reduced. 

Key ingredients:
Ultra Facial Cream:
Glacial glycoprotein: protects skin from changing temperatures, facilitating water retention of the skin.
Avocado oil: to provide intensive moisture to the skin.
Squalene: to help replenish skin’s barrier, keeping it soft, supple and moisturised.

Creamy Eye Treatment:
Avocado oil: to moisturise, nourish and soften skin.
Shea butter: to help defend dehydration, restore suppleness and improve the appearance of dry skin.

Pair it with:
Kiehl's Midnight Recovery Concentrate
Kiehl's Ultra Facial Cleanser

name: Calendula Petal-Infused Calming Mask
slogan: Gel mask cools & repairs stressed skin.
usage:
Apply a thick, visible layer of our calming face mask to clean skin
Leave face mask?on for 15 minutes
Rinse with warm water and massage gently in a circular motion 
Pat dry with a soft towel 
Avoid contact with eyes, in case of contact, rinse immediately with water
Recommended for use 3 times a week
details:
The MECCA View:
Instantly hydrate and soothe tired skin with this rejuvenating gel mask, providing an indulgent surge of cooling moisture upon application. Infused with hand-picked calendula and aloe vera, skin is left feeling soft, smooth and refreshed.

Key ingredients:
Calendula petals and extract: to soothe the skin.
Aloe vera: to hydrate, soothe and cool the skin.

Made without:
Parabens and sulphates.

Pair it with:
KIEHL'S Calendula Herbal Extract Toner
KIEHL'S Calendula Foaming Wash
KIEHL'S Ultra Facial Cream

name: Lip Balm #1
slogan: Perfect on the go nourishing lip balm.
usage: Apply liberally and allow an excess of the lip balm to be absorbed.
details:
The MECCA view:
A Kiehl's classic since the 1960's, this lip balm is a handbag must-have for soothed, nourished lips, 24/7. Formulated with squalene, aloe vera and vitamin E, the moisturising balm protects and relieves dry, chapped or cracked lips in the winter and throughout the year. 

Key ingredients:
Squalene: to help replenish the skin’s barrier, keeping it soft, supple and moisturised.
Aloe Vera: to hydrate and soothe skin.
Vitamin E: to moisturise and help neutralize skin-damaging free radicals.

Made without:
Parabens and sulphates.

Pair it with:
KIEHL'S Ultra Facial Cleanser
KIEHL'S Calendula Herbal Extract Toner

name: Daily Reviving Concentrate
slogan: Radiant looking skin with this energising oil.
usage: In the morning, lightly pat several drops all over face in an upward circular motion, avoiding the eye area. At night try Midnight Recovery Concentrate to visibly replenish and restore skin.
details:
The MECCA view:
This antioxidant-rich oil helps to strengthen skin, correct signs of fatigue and imbue your complexion with a healthy-looking glow. It is non-comedogenic and non-acnegenic.

Key ingredients:
Tamanu botanical oil: helps to reduce the appearance of daily damage as well as replenish and soothe skin. 
Sunflower botanical oil: helps to strengthen skin’s barrier and improve skin smoothness.
Ginger root essential oil: Helps defend skin from environmental aggressors with antioxidant protection.
Made without: 
Parabens and sulfates SLS and SLES.

Pair it with:
KIEHL'S Midnight Recovery Concentrate
KIEHL'S Ultra Facial Cream

name: GinZing Moisturiser
slogan: A caffeine-rich, oil-free moisturiser.
usage: Following a serum, apply liberally in the morning and evening.
details:
The MECCA view:
An oil-free gel moisturiser that instantly hydrates and boosts radiance. Powered by revitalising caffeine and energising panax-ginseng. This hydrator is suitable for all skin types and absorbs quickly, therefore making it perfect to wear under makeup.   

Key ingredients:
Caffeine: a natural anti-irritant that supports healthy skin function and revitalises tired skin leaving it radiant. 
Panax ginseng: energises the skin whilst improving its resilience. 
Squalane: maintains skins moisture barrier and hydration levels.

Made without:
Parabens, phthalates, sodium lauryl sulphate, propylene glycol, mineral oil, DEA, petrolatum, paraffin, polyethylene beads and formaldehyde.

Origins GinZing Refreshing Eye Cream 
Origins GinZing Energy-Boosting Treatment Lotion Mist

“This moisturiser layers perfectly under makeup because it's absorbed instantly, adding hydration and leaving the skin with a healthy glow.” – Julita, zone manager at Mecca Maxima Carousel

name: Original Skin Rose Clay Mask
slogan: A pore perfecting clay mask.
usage: Apply a thin layer to clean skin. Avoid eye area. Leave on 10 minutes and rinse off. Use 1-2 times per week.
details:
The MECCA view:
If you've got a busy schedule, the chances are your skin will be feeling the stress too. Origins has the answer to an easy and quick refresh in this Original Skin Rose Clay Mask. This vegan retexturising mask deeply cleans to perfect pores for a naturally flawless look - no filter required.

Key ingredients:
Rose clay: draws out excess sebum, dirt and debris to reduce congestion and breakouts.

Made without:
Animal products, parabens, phthalates, sodium lauryl sulphate, propylene glycol, mineral oil, DEA, petrolatum, paraffin, polyethylene beads and formaldehyde.

Origins Original Skin Matte Moisturiser

name: Skin Soothers Cleansing, Soothing and Fortifying Trio
slogan: Trio of skin soothing must-haves.
usage:
Dr. Andrew Weil for Origins™ Mega-Mushroom Skin Relief Micellar Cleanser
Saturate cotton pad. Gently smooth over entire face & neck. No rinsing necessary. Follow with your Mega-Mushroom regimen. Avoid getting in eyes.

Dr. Andrew Weil for Origins™ Mega-Mushroom Relief & Resilience Soothing Treatment Lotion
Gently shake bottle. Pour a small amount directly onto fingertips or cotton pad & press into skin.

Dr. Andrew Weil for Origin™ Mega-Mushroom Relief & Resilience Fortifying Emulsion
Can be used both in the AM or PM.

productVersion.name: Skin Soothers Cleansing, Soothing and Fortifying Trio

name: Be Curly Curl Enhancer
slogan: Intensify curls, combat frizz and boost shine.
usage: Apply generously to damp hair. Begin applying from ends of the hair to the scalp.
details:
The MECCA view:
Want lust-worthy locks? Say no more. This curl enhancer is formulated with a blend of hydrolysed wheat protein and certified organic aloe that work harmoniously to expand and retract the hair follicle, enhancing the curl while adding shine and taming frizz. Soy-derived vitamin E acts as a protectant from any environmental aggressors, preventing associated damage. Hair is thickened and restored as pro vitamin B5 adds moisture to the hair follicle.

Key ingredients:
Wheat protein: improves hair elasticity and prevents breakage.
Aloe vera: repairs, promotes hair growth and reduces irritation.
Marshmallow root: detangles, softens, soothes inflammation and promotes growth.

Made without:
Animal products, parabens, phthalates and sodium lauryl sulphate.

Direct from the brand: 
“When combing product through the hair, comb straight out and away from the root for maximum volume. Combing down will drag the curl meaning less volume. For extra boost, diffuse the hair with your head upside down whilst drying the root area.” - Mathew Wickham, Education Development Partner, Artistic Lead.

Pair it with:
Aveda Be Curly Shampoo
Aveda Be Curly Conditioner
Aveda Be Curly Enhancing Hair Spray

name: Rosemary Mint Purifying Shampoo
slogan: An invigorating and clarifying shampoo.
usage: Massage into wet hair. Rinse. Follow with Rosemary Mint Weightless Conditioner.
details:
The MECCA view:
Wake up your senses with this daily invigorating and deep cleansing silicone-free shampoo, suitable for normal to fine hair types in need of a volume boost. The 96% naturally derived* formulation gently clarifies hair (but never strips), whilst the delicious aroma of certified organic rosemary, peppermint and spearmint energizes and awakens the senses. 

Key ingredients:
Glycerin: strengthens hair and prevents split ends.
Rosemary: stimulates hair growth and reduces dandruff.
Micelles: gently remove product build-up and other impurities without disrupting the natural balance of scalp and hair.
White vinegar: helps gently purify the hair.
Made without:
Animal products, parabens, phthalates and sodium lauryl sulphate.

Pair it with:
Aveda Rosemary Mint Weightless Conditioner
Aveda Heat Relief Thermal Protector & Conditioning Mist
Aveda Rinseless Refresh Micellar Hair & Scalp Refresher

name: Scalp Benefits Balancing Shampoo
slogan: A gentle shampoo to purify and balance.
usage: Massage a small amount into wet hair. Rinse thoroughly. Follow with Scalp Benefits Balancing Conditioner to soothe and nourish the scalp and hair.
details:
The MECCA view:
Thoroughly cleanse hair at the roots by removing excess sebum with this purifying shampoo and create the perfect canvas for your most beautiful tresses imaginable. Suitable for all hair types, creating the ideal foundation for healthy, luscious locks.

Key ingredients:
Sea buckthorn: promotes hair strength and elasticity.
Burdock root: nourishes the scalp and strengthens hair.
Coneflower: increases circulation and promotes hair growth.

Made without:
Animal products, parabens, phthalates and sodium lauryl sulphate.

Pair it with:
Aveda Scalp Benefits Balancing Conditioner

name: Damage Remedy Daily Hair Repair
slogan: A reparative and protective leave-in treatment.
usage: Work a small amount of product in hands, apply through damp hair and comb to distribute. Do not rinse out. Style.
details:
The MECCA view:
Bring the vitality back to tired, dull tresses with this restorative leave in treatment, delivering immediate shine and softness, while providing long lasting moisture for ongoing nourished hair. Hair is protected from thermal damage up to 230°C. Formulated with coconut oil to leave the hair conditioned to the max. Quinoa protein rebuilds and repairs damaged hair, targeting the follicle with deep hydration.

Key ingredients:
Wheat protein: improves hair elasticity and prevents breakage
Alfalfa: strengthens hair and promotes growth 
Sea buckthorn: promotes hair strength and elasticity

Made without:
Animal products, parabens, phthalates and sodium lauryl sulphate.

Pair it with:
Aveda Damage Remedy Reconstructing Shampoo
Aveda Damage Remedy Reconstructing Conditioner

name: Thickening Tonic
slogan: A botanical mist to instantly thicken.
usage: Shake well. Spray thoroughly on towel-dried hair. Comb through. Blow-dry and style as desired.
details:
The MECCA view:
Achieve thicker, fuller tresses from roots to ends with this cult-favourite hair tonic. Formulated with amla, an ayurveda herb, which helps to thicken each individual strand of hair making it both look and feel instantly fuller. Wheat protein works to defend hair against thermal damage from styling. This product is cruelty free and vegan.

Key ingredients:
Wheat protein: improves hair elasticity and prevents breakage.
Aloe vera: promotes hair growth, reduces irritation and repairs the scalp and hair.
Caster seed: moisturises and promotes hair growth.

Made without:
Animal products, parabens, phthalates and sodium lauryl sulphate.

Aveda Pure Abundance Volumizing Shampoo

name: Be Curly Shampoo
slogan: A gentle shampoo for curly hair.
usage: Massage into wet hair and scalp. Rinse. Follow with be curly™ conditioner or intensive detangling masque.
details:
The MECCA view:
Calling all curly and wavy manes— this gentle shampoo will maintain and nourish your natural curl, giving your hair the TLC it deserves. Gentle enough for daily use, hair is left bouncy and soft, curls are defined, frizz is tamed and shine is enhanced. 
Key ingredients:

Wheat protein and organic aloe blend: expands when hair is wet and retracts when dry to define curl or wave.
Citrus pure-fume™: with certified organic lemon, bergamot, orange and other pure plant and flower essences.
Made without:
Animal products, parabens, phthalates and sodium lauryl sulphate.

name: Amino Acid Shampoo
slogan: Shampoo that adds body & shine to you hair.
usage: Wet hair and gently massage through hair, working formula into a lather. Rinse.
details:
The MECCA View:
Naturally-derived, this gentle shampoo is a shower essential. Formulated with amino acids, hydrolysed wheat proteins and pure coconut oil, softness and shine is achieved with a creamy lather and fresh scent, adding lasting body and fullness to your roots, lengths and ends.

Key ingredients:
Amino acids: known to moisturise by enhancing the skin's water retention.
Coconut oil: softens, stabilises and cleanses the hair.
Hydrolysed wheat protein: to help hair and skin retain its moisture and improve overall appearance.

Made without:
Animal products and parabens.

KIEHL'S Amino Acid Conditioner

name: Amino Acid Conditioner
slogan: Silicone-free conditioner adds shine & hydrates.
usage: After shampooing, massage onto wet hair, and leave in hair for two minutes. Rinse thoroughly.
details:
The MECCA view: 
Formulated with wheat proteins and amino acids, and then infused with coconut and jojoba oil, this silicone-free conditioner helps to maintain the hair’s natural moisture balance, strengthening and improving hair manageability. The result? Shiny, healthy hair without that weighed-down feeling. For the best results, pair with Kiehl’s Amino Acid Shampoo. 
Key ingredients:
Amino Acids: to enhance moisture retention.
Coconut: to gently cleanse, soften and protect.
Jojoba: to nurture and soften the hair and scalp.
Made without: 
Parabens, sulphates and silicone. 
Pair it with: 
KIEHL'S Amino Acid Shampoo

name: Mistress Hydrating Hair Balm
slogan: A leave in conditioning balm to reduce frizz.
usage: Smooth a small amount through damp or dry hair, working from mid-lengths to ends.
details:
The MECCA view:
This lightweight, oil-infused and sweet-smelling formula detangles, smooths and hydrates hair. Hair is left frizz-free, shiny, and feeling soft for the rest of the day. It also imbues your locks with a dreamy scent, with notes of guava, coconut, violet and vanilla. 
Key ingredients: 
Coconut oil: deeply nourishes hair. 
Shea butter: adds rich moisture to replenish dry hair. 
Argan oil: restores and smooths without weighing hair down. 

Made without:
Gluten, parabens, sulfates, petrolatum, and mineral oil.

name: First Class Dry Shampoo
slogan: Heavy-duty dry shampoo.
usage: Shake well and spray 25-30 centimetres from scalp. Allow 30 seconds for powders to activate, then massage and brush through to distribute.
details:
The MECCA view: It’s dry shampoo with super powers, capable of tackling HIIT-class level sweat from the scalp. With ingredients to calm and cool, it’s a pleasure to use, and the super fine charcoal powder means it erases oil and odour without adding weight. 
Key ingredients:
Charcoal powder: detoxifies the scalp, lifting dirt and buildup. 
White tea powder: soothes irritated scalps.

Parabens, sulfates, gluten, mineral oil and petrolatum.

name: Mixed Feelings Leave-In Blonde Toning Drops.
slogan: A custom toning formula for blonde hair.
usage: Mix desired amount into shampoo, conditioner or styling products to banish warm tones. Wash hands after applying.
details:
The MECCA view: 
Not all blondes are created equal, so why should toners be one shade fits all? These innovative drops let you pick whichever base you prefer (shampoo, conditioner or stylers) and in whichever dosage you like (light to deep), to turn anything into your personal best toner. It’s an easy, highly personal, way to keep blonde, silver or violet shades true, without another step in your regimen. 
Key ingredients: 
Violet pigments: tone unwanted brassiness for bright and creamy blonde and silver strands. 
Made without: 
Gluten, parabens, sulfates, petrolatum, and mineral oil.
Pair it with:

name: Expensive Amla Oil Hi-Shine Topcoat
slogan: A rinse-out gloss that leaves hair shiny.
usage: Smooth through clean, damp hair for two to three minutes in place of conditioner, one or two times a week as a treatment. Work a small amount through dry hair for added shine after styling.
details:
The MECCA view: A sheen-inducing step to add to your in-shower regimen. It leaves a weightless, protective layer on the hair which dials up shine and gives depth and dimension to your colour. It seals the cuticle to slow colour fading and protect from damage from hot tools. 
Key ingredients: 
Alma oil: nourishes, adds shine and strengthens hair.
Sea kelp extract: adds shine and protects hair from heat and UV damage. 
Sunflower seed oil: hydrates for long-lasting softness and frizz control.

Made without: 
Parabens, sulfates, gluten, mineral oil and petrolatum.

IGK Bad & Bougie Amla Oil Deep Repair Shampoo
IGK Bad & Bougie Amla Oil Deep Repair Conditioner

slogan: A hero for hair crying out for hydration.
usage: Lather and massage into scalp. Rinse thoroughly and follow with Hot Girls Conditioner to seal in moisture.
details:
The MECCA view: 
Do you have dry, damaged or overworked hair from heat tools? This super-nourishing shampoo is the answer. It infuses normal to dry hair of any thickness with deep hydration. It smooths locks and dials up the shine on even damaged lengths. The tropical-holiday scent it leaves behind on hair is a bonus.

Litchi extract: shields hair from pollution and oxidative stress. 
Vitamin E: conditions, nourishes and smooths hair.

name: Curl Shampoo
slogan: A creamy, curl defining shampoo.
usage: Apply to wet hair. Massage at scalp & work into lather. Use the rich lather to begin the detangling process if desired. Rinse. Follow with Curl Conditioner.
details:
The MECCA view:
Ideal for wavy, curly and coily hair types, this creamy low-lather shampoo gently cleanses (without stripping the hair) and promotes more stronger and defined curls straight after washing. 
Key ingredients:
Healthy Curl Complex: Our patent-pending curl technology is a unique blend of biopolymer film formers and emollients that deliver natural, flexible definition while providing ultimate manageability & strength for healthy curls.
Methiopeptide: A biomimetic source of Methionine, an amino acid known to contribute to hair strength and elasticity. 
Surfactant blend: This sulfate-free surfactant blend contains Babassu, Sunflower and Amino Acid derivatives for a creamy foam and conditioned feel.
Conditioning agents: Helps eliminate frizz while enhancing slip and softness to prevent the stripped feeling after rinsing that some textured hair experience.
Made without:
Silicone, sulphate, paraben, phthalate.
Pair it with:Living Proof Curl Conditioner
Living Proof Curl Enhancer
Living Proof Curl Definer

name: Curl Conditioner
slogan: A moisturising and detangling conditioner.
usage: Apply & spread throughout wet hair. Work product from root to tip & detangle your hair. For stronger textures, work through hair in sections using a comb or brush to begin forming curl groupings. Rinse as desired.
details:
The MECCA view:
Ideal for wavy, curly and coily hair, this moisturising and detangling conditioner works to prevent damage whilst encouraging curl groupings. Infused with Living Proof's Healthy Curl Complex, that prevents damage and moisturises hair without leaving behind any heavy residue. This product is safe to use on colour treated hair.
Key ingredients:
Healthy curl complex: our patent-pending curl technology is a unique blend of biopolymer film formers and emollients that deliver natural, flexible definition while providing ultimate manageability & strength for healthy curls.
Methiopeptide: a biomimetic source of Methionine, an amino acid known to contribute to hair strength and elasticity.
Rich conditioning base: a well-balanced blend of cationic materials provides a treatment-like feel when rinsed and is enough for the strongest of textures but light enough to not weigh down looser waves. Helps eliminate frizz. 
Shea butter: when combined with emollients, Shea Butter helps provide cushion and slip to help form curl groupings.
Made without:
Silicone, sulphate, paraben, phthalate.

Pair it with:
Living Proof Curl Shampoo
Living Proof Curl Enhancer
Living Proof Curl Definer

name: Perfect hair Day™ Conditioner
slogan: A weightless, perfecting conditioner.
usage: After shampoo, apply conditioner to clean, wet hair, focusing on mid-shaft to ends. Spread evenly throughout hair. Rinse.
details:
The MECCA view:
Condition without compromise with this weightless, perfecting conditioner that smooths, polishes and protects - without heavy silicones that can cause buildup. Added slip modifiers detangle hair for reduced damage while a ceramide-like conditioning agent smooths cuticles. Hair is left silky, soft and ready to take on the day. Ideal for most hair types. Colour safe and suitable for chemically treated hair.

Key ingredients:
Healthy hair molecule: detangles without weighting hair down and repels dirt and oil.

Made without:
Parabens, phthalates, SLS, SLES and silicones.

Pair it with: 
Living Proof Perfect Hair Day Shampoo
Living Proof Perfect Hair Day 5-in-1 Styling Treatment
Living Proof Perfect Hair Day Night Cap Overnight Perfector

name: Curl Enhancer
slogan: A lightweight, conditioning styler.
usage: Apply to wet hair root to tip. Evenly distribute throughout your hair. Scrunch to form curl groupings. Dry as usual.
details:
The MECCA view:
Ideal for wavy hair, this lightweight styler boosts your natural waves. Powered by Living Proofs Healthy Curl Complex for shinier, smoother and effortless waves. 

Key ingredients:
Healthy curl complex: our patent-pending curl technology is a unique blend of biopolymer film formers and emollients that deliver natural, flexible definition while providing ultimate manageability & strength for healthy curls.
Methiopeptide: a biomimetic source of Methionine, an amino acid known to contribute to hair strength and elasticity.
Lightweight conditioning base: a blend of cationic materials and emollients that provide slip and shine, containing a cuticle sealing ingredient for visibly healthier waves. Tailored resin blend: optimized to enhance waves and help eliminate frizz, creating soft hold and control. 
Emollients: a balanced level of emollients formulated for looser waves to help control frizz and smooth the hair shaft without adding weight.

Made without:
Silicone, sulphate, paraben and phthalate.
Pair it with:Living Proof Curl Shampoo
Living Proof Living Proof Curl Conditioner
Living Proof Curl Defining Gel

name: Flex Shaping Hairspray
slogan: A soft, flexible-hold hairspray.
usage: Spray on damp hair to build a structured style. Apply on dry hair to style or finish with or without heat.
details:
The MECCA view:
A versatile hairspray, developed for use on both damp and dry hair, that offers a medium hold and flexible control. Delivers a flexible, touchable finish that is brush-able, layer-able and rework-able for maximum convenience. Offers heat protection up to 230°C.

Key ingredients:
Flexible web technology: holds locks in place; setting, styling and finishing damp to dry hair.

Made without:
Parabens, phthalates and silicones.

Pair it with:
Living Proof Perfect Hair Day Triple Detox Shampoo
Living Proof Perfect Hair Day Conditioner

name: Full Dry Volume Blast
slogan: A weightless hair mist for lift, body and bounce
usage:
Shake can well before each spray. Hold canister 10' away from dry hair. Section hair, lift & spray roots to ends. Repeat until desired style is achieved making sure to shake can between each spray. Tousle hair with your fingers. Spray on finished styles for extra texture and hold.

Full Dry Volume Blast is buildable. Start with a little, and add on, depending on how much volume and texture you want in your style. 

Spray Full Dry Volume Blast throughout hair in an upwards motion, not down onto hair. 

If experiencing too much texture, hold can further away from head and apply in a sweeping motion.
details:
The MECCA view:
Go big or go home with this featherlight styling spray, delivering a surge of instant volume for big body and texture that will outlast your plans. Powered by Living Proof’s Volumizing + Texturizing Molecule, which creates big volume by increasing the space between hair strands. Ideal for fine, flat hair and anyone seeking volume and texture. 

Key ingredients:
ETAS: a volumising and texturising molecule to grant fullness and definition.

Made without:
Parabens, phthalates and silicones.

Pair it with:
Living Proof Full Thickening Shampoo
Living Proof Full Thickening Conditioner
Living Proof Thickening Cream
